name: Actualisation
description:
You, along with your government, have both come to the realisation that you don't want to be making weapons anymore. When security arrived at your lab, you weren't quite ready and you don't really have much more time.

Time to find out the biggest bomb you can build out of things around around you before security opens fire leaving all the terrible things you've built in the hands of people who shouldn't have them.

Built for the Extra Credit Game Jame 2018
